message: What about WWDC Keynote streaming ? Do Amsterdam people do that kind of thing ?
@leah that should do :)
anything going on tonight?
"Unfortunately, there's been no indication that Apple will be video streaming this event" :(
wwdcbeerdinner +1
Well a liveblog isn't too bad
I can imagine many places that do beer and dinner, but none that do WWDC streaming...
i know http://oreillys.nl/amsterdam/ and http://www.oldbell.nl/Site_2/Home.html will do beer, food and wifi
rembrandtplein is full of tourists :)
I'm up for a beer/dinner after.
leidsestraat
6pm?
@leah 7pm
@leah otherwise we'll just open up engadget liveblog or something :)
will there be a live stream from wwdc at all? couldn't find anything about it …
hrm, well the other suggestion is in dam square which I assume has more tourists :P
@erikpub arrive early, claim seats :)
nearby suggestions outside of the center: De Cantine (not sure about the WiFi) http://decantine.nl, or Lloyd Hotel http://www.lloydhotel.com/article-235-en.html
a combination of both would be nice! :)
Beer, dinner, WWDC sounds good :)
and have some laptops?
will the keynote have live video for sure?
maybe we could just go to a bar/restaurant with wifi?
anyone have a suggestion for a good bar with food and wifi?
phillippbosch: probably not, but liveblog will have to do.
there must be another dutch person on here which knows a place with wifi, beer and not too complicated food, if you are looking for alternatives :)
'skek, which is pretty close to central station, offers really good food, wifi and beers ... As far as I remember (well, from yesterday), they do have two rooms and we might crush one?
@erikpub the old bell looks good. I like rebrandtplein
this place is nice, but I dunno if they have wifi: http://bit.ly/imEQ4I
so the tara it is then?
isn't it going to be too busy if we come with a large group?
but yeah, everything in the city center is going to be busy
what's the local time for the WWDC keynote?
http://www.engadget.com/2011/06/06/engadget-broadcasting-live-from-wwdc/
next pub option: The Tara, at Rokin: http://www.thetara.com/contact.html. has a meeting room with WiFi and beamer but that's not free...
Yes, http://www.wifi-amsterdam.nl/free_wifi_internet.html
let's try tara - i'll be there early (i'm not staying in a hotel) so if it does turn out to be bad, i'll shout on convore :)
But the WWDC is just going to announce iOS5 and some other stuff, right? No iPhone news expected iirc.
don't count on me, I already have stuff to do tonight...
i remember it being quite full, the few times i was there
regulierdwaarstraat? ;)
It *is* Monday evening, so it might not be that bad.
The Tara is a cool place. Werck is too crowded, usually.
so far for being early in The Tara....
@erikpub couldn't tell you.... ring them during the break if you want to be sure
does tara have free wifi outside of the meeting room?
+1 for cocktail and tara
there won't be a stream
so, is the tara plan still on, after the cocktails?
Around which time will you guys/gals show up there?
And Tara is a pretty big bar so I guess it'll be ok.
Tara indeed *is* big (much bigger than the Old Bell)
Don't forget: free cocktails, courtesy of Fabrique.nl, directly after the Lightning talks. In the expo-room btw.
what about having a cocktail and stream to the three projectors we look at right now?
oh that's today? sweet.
cocktails sounds good
i'm quite curious about ios5 :)
Yep, today Fabrique offers everyone a free cocktail and tomorrow the whole day herbal teas, fruit juices and massages, also in Expo Room (1st floor, also used for the open spaces)
Let's do the Tara, they probably have wifi and it's in the centre and it can hold all of us.
Just go to Dam Square and then a little further south, next to the building pit for the North-South metroline.
+2 for cocktail and tara, if we dont pass out due to lack of sleep :)
... and if we can find our way there
It's easy: http://goo.gl/Seolv
@ulope depends on when the cocktails end - i will go there pretty much straight after
.. someone please keep this topic up to date during the night ?
@peritus so people joining later know where the crowd is.
The cocktails will probably end around 6:30PM. I'll try and keep this updated, otherwise just mention me @niels_bom on Twitter (I get an alert then)
Aaand, we're here!
Helooo-oo-o-o
sorry I couldn't make it to the bar after all. I injured myself yesterday and I was really feeling it today so I went home to rest
"Ladder."
to be specific, yesterday I fell down the stairs in a bar. Dutch staircases are too steep!
@defunkt told the joke: What is the Dutch word for "staircase"?
@adsva I actually saw some guys using the hook yesterday to lift a piano. I'm totally serious.
Who needs stairs when every building has a hook!
Pics or it didnt't happen?
hook me up, scotty
And there's a TJ Hooker joke in there somewhere..
@leah that's not too unusual - the staircases are usually too small to fit large furniture
@erikpub I think that was the joke :)
btw, a staircase like http://www.schoonmaak-assortiment.nl/im/artikelen/trappenhuis.jpg is a "trappenhuis" in dutch, a ladder in dutch is pretty much the same as in english
@leah That's actually why those buildings lean forward slightly.
